title: $:/litClock/times/-23:46-Joyce Carol Oates
quote_first: In the Kismet Lounge, Mr. Early sees suddenly to his horror it’s
quote_last: He’s been in this place far longer than he’d planned, and he’s had more to drink than he’d planned. Shame! What if, back at the E-Z, his little girl is crying piteously for him?
quoteSourceTitle: Doll: A Romance of the Mississippi
